name: Acupuncturist
description: Practitioner who treats patients by inserting thin needles into the skin at specific points.

name: Allergist
description: Specialist in diagnosing and treating allergies and immune system diseases.

name: Audiologist
description: Professional who evaluates and treats hearing and balance disorders.

name: Cardiologist
description: Doctor who specializes in the study and treatment of heart diseases and abnormalities.

name: Chiropractor
description: Practitioner focused on the diagnosis and treatment of neuromuscular disorders through manual adjustment.

name: Dentist
description: Professional qualified to treat the diseases and conditions that affect the teeth and gums.

name: Dermatologist
description: Medical practitioner qualified to diagnose and treat skin disorders.

name: Dietitian
description: Expert in dietetics, helping people manage their health through nutrition and food choices.

name: Ear, Nose & Throat Doctor
description: Specialist (Otolaryngologist) focused on the ears, nose, and throat area.

name: Emergency Medicine Physician
description: Doctor who focuses on the immediate decision making and action necessary to prevent death or further disability.

name: Endocrinologist
description: Specialist in the endocrine system and its diseases, including diabetes and thyroid issues.

name: Endodontist
description: Dental specialist concerned with the study and treatment of the dental pulp.

name: Family Physician
description: Doctor who provides comprehensive healthcare for people of all ages.

name: Gastroenterologist
description: Specialist in the digestive system and its disorders.

name: Genetic Counselor
description: Professional with specialized education in genetics and counseling to help people understand their genetic risks.

name: Geriatrician
description: Primary care physician who specializes in treating elderly patients.

name: Hand Surgeon
description: Surgical specialist focused on treating conditions of the hand, wrist, and forearm.

name: Hematologist
description: Specialist in the study of blood and blood-forming tissues.

name: Hepatologist
description: Specialist in the study and treatment of the liver, gallbladder, biliary tree, and pancreas.

name: Infectious Disease Specialist
description: Physician who diagnoses and treats complex infections caused by bacteria, viruses, or parasites.

name: Infertility Specialist
description: Doctor specializing in diagnosing and treating reproductive issues and infertility.

name: Internist
description: Physician specializing in internal medicine, focusing on adult care.

name: Lactation Consultant
description: Professional who specializes in the clinical management of breastfeeding.

name: Naturopathic Doctor
description: Practitioner of a system of alternative medicine based on the theory that diseases can be successfully treated or prevented without the use of drugs.

name: Neonatologist
description: Specialist in the medical care of newborn infants, especially the ill or premature newborn.

name: Nephrologist
description: Specialist in the diagnosis and management of kidney diseases.

name: Neurologist
description: Specialist in the anatomy, functions, and organic disorders of nerves and the nervous system.

name: Neurosurgeon
description: Surgeon specializing in the nervous system, including the brain and spinal cord.

name: Nurse Practitioner
description: Advanced practice nurse trained to assess patient needs, order and interpret diagnostic and laboratory tests, and diagnose disease.

name: Nutritionist
description: Person who advises on matters of food and nutrition and their impacts on health.

name: OB-GYN
description: Specialist in female reproductive health, pregnancy, and childbirth.

name: Occupational Therapist
description: Helps people across the lifespan participate in the things they want and need to do through the therapeutic use of everyday activities.

name: Oncologist
description: Medical practitioner qualified to diagnose and treat tumors and cancer.

name: Ophthalmologist
description: Medical doctor specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of eye disorders and performing eye surgery.

name: Optometrist
description: Professional who provides primary vision care, ranging from sight testing and correction to the diagnosis, management, and treatment of vision changes.

name: Oral Surgeon
description: Surgeon specializing in the mouth, jaws, and face.

name: Orthodontist
description: Dentist who specializes in correcting teeth and jaws that are positioned improperly.

name: Orthopedic Surgeon
description: Surgeon who specializes in the musculoskeletal system.

name: Pain Management Specialist
description: Physician who evaluates, diagnoses, and treats all different types of pain.

name: Palliative Care Specialist
description: Medical professional focused on providing relief from the symptoms and stress of a serious illness.

name: Pediatric Dentist
description: Dentist who specializes in the oral health of children from infancy through the teen years.

name: Pediatrician
description: Medical practitioner specializing in children and their diseases.

name: Periodontist
description: Dentist who specializes in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of periodontal disease (gum disease).

name: Physiatrist
description: Medical doctor who specializes in physical medicine and rehabilitation.

name: Physical Therapist
description: Professional who helps patients improve their movement and manage their pain.

name: Plastic Surgeon
description: Surgeon who specializes in the repair, reconstruction, or replacement of physical defects of form or function.

name: Podiatrist
description: Specialist in the treatment of feet and their ailments.

name: Prosthodontist
description: Dentist who specializes in the restoration and replacement of teeth.

name: Psychiatrist
description: Medical practitioner specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of mental illness.

name: Psychologist
description: Specialist in the study of mind and behavior and the treatment of mental, emotional, and behavioral disorders.

name: Psychotherapist
description: Practitioner who treats mental health problems by talking with a psychiatrist, psychologist or other mental health provider.

name: Pulmonologist
description: Specialist in the anatomy, physiology, and pathology of the lungs.

name: Radiologist
description: Medical doctor who specializes in diagnosing and treating diseases and injuries using medical imaging techniques.

name: Rheumatologist
description: Specialist in the diagnosis and treatment of arthritis and other diseases of the joints, muscles, and bones.

name: Sleep Medicine Specialist
description: Physician who diagnoses and treats sleep disturbances and disorders.

name: Speech-Language Pathologist
description: Specialist who works to prevent, assess, diagnose, and treat speech, language, social communication, and swallowing disorders.

name: Sports Medicine Specialist
description: Medical professional who specializes in the treatment of people who have injuries from sports and exercise.

name: Surgeon
description: Medical professional who performs surgery.

name: Urologist
description: Doctor who specializes in diseases of the urinary tract and the male reproductive system.

name: Vascular Surgeon
description: Surgeon who manages diseases of the vascular system (arteries, veins, and lymphatic circulation).

name: Medical Assistant
description: Medical assistant, fitters, ...

name: Clinical Nurse Specialist
description: Clinical nurse specialist (CNS)

name: Anesthesiologist
description: Anesthesiologist

name: Pharmacist
description: Pharmacist

name: Respiratory Therapist
description: Respiratory therapist

name: Technologist
description: Technologist, technicians, techs...
